narrative:
There were not any non-compliant items identified at the time of inspection.  This facility is not conducting USDA
regulated activities. 
 
An exit briefing was conducted with a facility representative.  To cancel the facility's registration, fax the request on
letterhead to the Eastern Regional Office at 919-855-7123 and call at 919-855-7100 to confirm receipt or mail the
request, via certified mail, to:
USDA/APHIS/Animal Care
Dr. Elizabeth Goldentyer, Director
920 Main Campus Dr., Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
